item.title: UW News • Volleyball: Volleyball Announces Summer Camps
item.description: MADISON, Wis. – The Wisconsin Volleyball program is thrilled to announce its 2026 summer volleyball camps!  This summer, Wisconsin Volleyball will be offering sessions for young kids, middle schoolers, and high school students. Wisconsin camps are geared to individuals of all levels including those just starting the sport to those that have been playing at the highest of levels. Join us this summer for instruction, drills, and an unforgettable experience.

item.title: UW News • Men's Basketball: Badgers knock off No. 8 Illinois in overtime thriller
item.description: Led by 20-point performances from Nick Boyd and John Blackwell, the Wisconsin men's basketball team upset No. 8 Illinois, 92-90, in an overtime thriller on Tuesday at the State Farm Center in Champaign.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: Tickets on Sale for AVCA First Serve
item.description: MADISON, Wis. – The Wisconsin volleyball team will kick-off the 2026 season in Milwaukee at the Fiserv Forum in the 2026 AVCA First Serve where eight elite teams, including the Badgers, will open the new season. Tickets are now on sale for the event on August 21-23.

UW News • Volleyball: Booth, Simon garner Volleyball awards
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - The 2025 Wisconsin volleyball team celebrated their annual program banquet at Union South on Saturday, presenting the winners of the Bring It! and Most Improved Awards.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: Badgers to Play in 2026 AVCA First Serve
item.description: MADISON, Wis. – Mark the calendars as the Wisconsin volleyball team will compete at the 2026 American Volleyball Coaches Association (AVCA) First Serve, held at Milwaukee's Fiserv Forum from August 21-23, 2026.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: Colyer Named CWSA Honda Cup Finalist
item.description: MADISON, Wis. – After a prolific season with the Wisconsin volleyball team, outside hitter Mimi Colyer has been named a finalist in volleyball for the 2026 Honda Cup – the Collegiate Women Sports Award presented by Honda, announced by the CWSA Wednesday afternoon.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: Booth signs with Italian Serie A1 League
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - After an illustrious collegiate career, middle blocker Carter Booth has signed with the Unione Yamamay Busto Arisizio of the Italian Serie A1 League to begin her professional tenure.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: Wisconsin lands at No. 8 in Fall Learfield Directors' Cup
item.description: The National Association of Collegiate Directors of Athletics and LEARFIELD released its Fall Division I Learfield Directors' Cup standings this Tuesday, with Wisconsin placing eighth after a another successful fall season.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: Volleyball adds Travis and Hoppe
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - Head coach Kelly Sheffield of the Wisconsin volleyball program has announced the signing of outside hitter Eva Travis from UC Santa Barbara and setter Isabelle Hoppe from Pine-Richland High School in Gibsonia, Pa. Both Travis and Hoppe will arrive for spring semester of 2026.

item.description: 15-year coaching veteran joins Badgers after stints at Arkansas, Baylor, BYU, LSU

item.title: UW News • Football: 91 Badgers named to 2025-26 Fall Academic All-Big Ten team
item.description: The Big Ten Conference announced its 2025-26 Fall Academic All-Big Ten teams this Wednesday, with a tremendous 91 student-athletes at the University of Wisconsin-Madison achieving the honor.
